category.name: Style Sheets
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: ICS_truncate_string_attribute_value
preference.preference_description: Determines whether string attribute value enter by user will be truncated. The default value is true. Valid values: true- String attribute value length will be truncated to attribute length. false- If string attribute value length is more than attribute length, Teamcenter will display an error.
